Series.Actors: |Daisy Betts|Andre Braugher|Scott Speedman|Camille De Pazzis|Dichen Lachman|Autumn Reeser|Jessy Schram|Daniel Lissing|Robert Patrick|Sahr Ngaujah|
Series.Overview: 500 feet beneath the ocean's surface, the U.S. ballistic missile submarine Colorado receives their orders. Through a radio channel designed to be used if the main base has been wiped out, they're told to fire nuclear weapons at Pakistan. Captain Marcus Chaplin (Andre Braugher) demands confirmation of the orders only to be unceremoniously relieved of duty by the White House. XO Sam Kendal (Scott Speedman) suddenly finds himself in charge of the submarine and facing the same difficult decision. When he also refuses to fire without official confirmation of the orders, the Colorado is targeted, fired upon, and hit. With their submarine crippled, and their own nation against them, the crew of the Colorado must survive unprecedented odds and set up a base of operations on a nearby island. Armed with a cache of nuclear missiles and a team of Navy SEAL's, this is their new home, and this is thei

Episode.GuestStars: Matt Gerald|Omid Abtahi|Max Adler|David Rees Snell|Michael Ng|Jessica Camacho|Will Rothhaar|Bruce Davison
Episode.Overview: The submarine "USS Colorado" receives orders to fire nuclear weapons at Pakistan. When the Captain and XO demand confirmation, the Colorado crew are declared rogue enemies of their own country.

Episode.GuestStars: Jay Hernandez|Jay Karnes|Michael Ng|Omid Abtahi|John Prosky|Assaf Cohen|Jenny Cooper|Ilia Volok|Chad Michael Collins
Episode.Overview: More than 20 warships close in on the Colorado. As Kendal is forced into a battle on the ground, Prosser questions Marcus' judgement.

Episode.GuestStars: Jay Karnes|Jessica Camacho|Will Rothhaar|Michael Gaston|April Grace|Michael Ng|Chad Michael Collins|Carlos Leal|Tyler Tuione|Bruce Davison
Episode.Overview: A search for missing crew members leads to Serrat's compound and an ominous demand. A clandestine meeting between Kylie and Admiral Shepard confirms that the fire order came through a back channel.

Episode.GuestStars: Jay Karnes|Jessica Camacho|Will Rothhaar|Michael Gaston|David Rees Snell|Michael Mosley|Michael Ng|Bruce Davison|Jay Hernandez
Episode.Overview: Even as Marcus and Sam learn that they have been charged with treason against the United States, a greater threat within their own crew is brewing. Meanwhile, an old friend of Sam's, Paul Wells, pays Christine a visit and tries to ease her fears about her husband.

Episode.GuestStars: Jay Karnes|April Grace|Omid Abtahi|Michael Ng|Bruce Davison|Jay Hernandez
Episode.Overview: In an attempt to end the standoff on Sainte Marina, Marcus and Sam enter into tense negotiations with the U.S. Government. Meanwhile, when a critical system fails, Grace must take command of the Colorado on a perilous repair operation.

Episode.GuestStars: Gideon Emery|Omid Abtahi|David Rees Snell|Jessica Camacho|Michael Ng|Jay Hernandez
Episode.Overview: The crew is hit with an attack by an unknown force unlike anything theyâ€™ve seen before. As confusion and aggression take hold, Marcus and Sam can no longer trust their own senses even as they race to save the sub and defend the island.

Episode.GuestStars: Jay Karnes|Gideon Emery|Jessica Camacho|Will Rothhaar|David Rees Snell|Adrian LaTourelle|Martha Hackett|Jay Hernandez
Episode.Overview: As Marcus and Sam hunt for the traitor in their ranks who stole their nuclear launch key, Prosser disobeys orders and starts a small war he canâ€™t control. Meanwhile Grace and James must work together to defuse a dangerous situation, as back in D.C. Christine is indicted as Sam's co-conspirator.

Episode.GuestStars: Jay Karnes|Gideon Emery|Jessica Camacho|Michael Mosley|Michael Ng|Tyler Tuione|Jay Hernandez
Episode.Overview: Marcus brings the islanders and the members of the Colorado together for a feast in the spirit of Thanksgiving; Grace searches for the truth when an essential crew member is accused of a crime.

Episode.GuestStars: Jay Karnes|Jessica Camacho|Michael Gaston|David Rees Snell|Cas Anvar|Shaun Toub|Nazneen Contractor|Sam Page|Mitchell Fink|Jay Hernandez
Episode.Overview: The crew waits for a visit from its families; Marcus must contemplate the unthinkable; the reason for the attack on Pakistan is revealed.

Episode.GuestStars: Jason Beghe|Chin Han|David Rees Snell|Will Rothhaar
Episode.Overview: Sam and James depart the island in a daring rescue attempt. Back on the island of Sainte Marina, a Chinese diplomat arrives to make a deal with Marcus. With scarcity and a prison problem plaguing him, Marcus finds himself treading down a more treacherous path than he could have imagined.

Episode.GuestStars: Jason Beghe|Chin Han|David Rees Snell|Will Rothhaar
Episode.Overview: A typhoon, a mutiny and a Washington coup d'etat will force Marcus and his crew into unlikely alliances. As Sam's grief strains his loyalty to Marcus, will Sainte Marina get the supplies it so desperately needs? How far will Marcus go to ensure the crew's survival -- will it cost him his life?

Episode.EpisodeName: The Pointy End of the Spear
Episode.GuestStars: David Rees Snell|Jessica Camacho|Michael Gaston|Ernie Hudson|Will Rothhaar|Michael Mosley|Chin Han|Michael Ng|Bruce Davison
Episode.Overview: Kylie works with Admiral Shepard to bring down the President, using evidence of what really happened in Pakistan. This affords Marcus the opportunity to surrender the Colorado, if all goes according to plan. Meanwhile, Speaker of the House Conrad Buell, meets with a small group of Washington heavyweights to discuss the unthinkable when Kylieâ€™s video information helps persuade him to participate in a risky and treasonous maneuver.

Episode.GuestStars: Will Rothhaar|Jessica Camacho|Michael Mosley|David Rees Snell|Michael Gaston|Jason Beghe|Chin Han|Michael Ng
Episode.Overview: In the exciting series finale, a violent battle for control erupts on the submarine, which leaves the Colorado vulnerable to capture by a third party â€” one with an exploitative plan. Can Marcus and Sam take control of the sub before itâ€™s too late?
